title: This Week in Impeachment: Are We There Yet?
description:
With two weeks of public impeachment hearings in the books, how will the next phase of the inquiry take shape?
Guest: Jim Newell, senior politics writer at Slate. Dahlia Lithwick, writes about the courts and the law for Slate.
Slate Plus members get bonus segments and ad-free podcast feeds. Sign up now.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Damning testimony continued to point towards the president and his close associates, but did it change the politics around impeachment?
